name: OVERBOARDING
description:
Your pirate ship has been infested with disgusting RATS! As you're the lowest-ranked pirate on board, you've been tasked with going below deck and cleaning up this horrible mess. Throw the rats overboard through the hole using the rope. Be careful, however! The rats will try to chew your rope into pieces. You can prevent this by disconnecting the cord and dropping the rats. Then they'll be back for revenge, however. Clean them up to become the successful pirate you've always dreamed of being. YARRRRRRR!!!

RECOMMENDED: FULL SCREEN

CONTROLS: -Left Mouse/Right Mouse
